found.description: a one letter code defining what the status of the hold is after it has been confirmed

waitingdate.description: the date the item was marked as waiting for the patron at the library

itemtype.description: If record level hold, the optional itemtype of the item the patron is requesting

reservedate.description: the date the hold was placed

priority.description: where in the queue the patron sits

timestamp.description: date and time the hold was last updated

cancellationdate.description: the date the hold was cancelled

gonenoaddress.description: set to 1 if library marked this patron as having an unconfirmed address

address.description: first address line of patron's primary address

streetnumber.description: street number of patron's primary address

sort1.description: a field that can be used for any information unique to the library

lost.description: set to 1 if library marked this patron as having lost his card

altcontactcountry.description: the country for the alternate contact for the patron

B_state.description: state or province of patron's alternate address

altcontactstate.description: the state for the alternate contact for the patron

mobile.description: the other phone number for patron's primary address

B_address2.description: second address line of patron's alternate address

B_zipcode.description: zip or postal code of patron's alternate address

fax.description: fax number for patron's primary address

city.description: city or town of patron's primary address

relationship.description: used for children to include the relationship to their guarantor

sort2.description: a field that can be used for any information unique to the library

email.description: primary email address for patron's primary address

streettype.description: street type of patron's primary address

B_phone.description: phone number for patron's alternate address

contactnote.description: a note related to patron's alternate address

altcontactphone.description: the phone number for the alternate contact for the patron

sms_provider_id.description: the provider of the mobile phone number defined in smsalertnumber

dateexpiry.description: date the patron's card is set to expire

updated_on.description: time of last change could be useful for synchronization with external systems (among others)

contactfirstname.description: used for children to include first name of guarantor

othernames.description: any other names associated with the patron

B_streetnumber.description: street number of patron's alternate address

phonepro.description: secondary phone number for patron's primary address

guarantorid.description: borrowernumber used for children or professionals to link them to guarantor or organizations

privacy_guarantor_checkouts.description: controls if relatives can see this patron's checkouts

contacttitle.description: used for children to include title of guarantor

privacy.description: patron's privacy settings related to their reading history

flags.description: a number associated with the patron's permissions

checkprevcheckout.description: produce a warning for this patron if this item has previously been checked out to this patron if 'yes', not if 'no', defer to category setting if 'inherit'

parameters.description: A JSON object containing informations about the new hold
parameters.name: body

found.description: a one letter code defining what the status of the hold is after it has been confirmed

waitingdate.description: the date the item was marked as waiting for the patron at the library

itemtype.description: If record level hold, the optional itemtype of the item the patron is requesting

reservedate.description: the date the hold was placed

priority.description: where in the queue the patron sits

timestamp.description: date and time the hold was last updated

cancellationdate.description: the date the hold was cancelled
